Brian Salemi

Brooklyn, NY 11213 · (617) 763-6805 · briandsalemi@gmail.com

I'm a Full-stack Software Engineer with a background in writing and a passion for environmental and social causes. I discovered web development through my desire to apply my creativity in a new medium and create work that helps better lives. In addition to my technical abilities, I possess excellent communication, both written and verbal, that can help progressive, socially-aware, and mission-driven companies move towards and achieve their specific goals.

Projects

Grow To Go

Try it here

Mock ecommerce website helping users find the perfect houseplant that fits their lifestyle, needs, and capabilities. Built with a React and Redux frontend and Rails API backend.

My Tasks

Try it here

React and Rails-based task list app that keeps track of users' tasks and upcoming deadlines. Users can create, filter, update, and delete tasks and are alerted when the deadline for an incomplete task is approaching.

Vie Games

Try it here

Ruby on Rails based video game and gaming event Content Management System that keeps track of users’ games and upcoming events. Users can also add new games and events to the database and rate the games they own.

National Park CLI

Try it here

Ruby gem for hiking and nature enthusiasts that presents a list of every national park in the United States and U.S. territories. Users can request a bio if they wish to learn more about a specific park.

Interests

Apart from programming, I enjoy spending the majority of my time outdoors. When the weather and seasons permit, you can usually find me gardening, going for hikes and jogs, and exploring parks and forests.

When wandering around in the woods isn't an option, I enjoy playing video games, reading books, and hanging with my cat.
